title: A Chance to travel
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Dept. of Planning and Community Development, partner
subject_group: Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Australia - Armed forces
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Veterans - Australia
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Australia. Army. Australian and New Zealand Army Corps
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Australia. Army
abstract: "I felt it would be a good chance to travel, and a good experience."
description: When George Snowden joined the Australian army, he was given the opportunity to tour Australia. Despite being given the chance to travel across the country, Snowden ended up suffering from a knee injury and was happy to return home after seeing most of the country.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002737; In our words: stories from Victorian veterans [St Arnaud Veterans]; Active; 2011
